channel.title: Fall '25 Week 5 :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: Resources Slides Video Script Hello and welcome to the week five announcements video for CIS 527 and CC510 in fall 2025. So this week you should be working on lab 2, which is due this Wednesday. We’ll talk about lab 2 in just a second, but remember that’s due tomorrow. Next Tuesday, we’re going to have our first discussion, so make sure you’re planning ahead for that. Next Wednesday is going to be the lab 3 quizzes, and in two weeks, we’re going to have lab 3 due and also our second discussion as well.
